snippet: The company appoints a new chief financial officer, Andrew Warren, and spreads out the responsibilities of the former chief operating officer who left and will not be replaced.
abstract: The company appoints a new chief financial officer, Andrew Warren, and spreads out the responsibilities of the former chief operating officer who left and will not be replaced.
lead_paragraph: Discovery Communications on Monday named a new chief financial officer and spread out the responsibilities of its former chief operating officer, completing a reorganization of the company's executive suite.

headline.main: After Departures, Discovery Reorganizes Its Executive Suite
